title: "Vatican speaks out in 'killer robots' debate at UN raising weaponization of artificial intelligence"
excerpt: "The Vatican has told a UN meeting in Geneva that the use of \"killer robots\" and other lethal autonomous weapons systems that use artificial intelligence violates international treaties because innocent civilians could be erroneously targeted."
